main_dag.description: Complete LLM parallel strategy deployment DAG with all critical issues fixed: complete pipeline stage connections, all 4 decode stages implemented, proper node connectivity throughout

simplified_dag.description: Simplified overview DAG showing high-level prefill/decode phases and communication patterns

special_features: Fixed all missing pipeline stage connections for stages 2, 3, 4
Complete decode phase with all 4 stages implemented
Proper node connectivity - no isolated nodes
Dashed lines for gate selection in MoE routing
GPU boundaries clearly labeled with specific GPU IDs (0-63)
Input/output dimensions specified for each node
No cycles - strict DAG topology verified

fixes_applied: Added complete pipeline stage connections for stages 2, 3, and 4
Implemented all 4 decode stages with proper GPU assignments
Fixed node connectivity issues - all nodes now have proper inputs/outputs
Verified no cycles in the DAG structure
Maintained parallel strategy correctness (PP=4, EP=4, TP=2, SP=2/1)
